freenet.pluginmanager
Interface FredPluginFCP

public interface FredPluginFCP

Interface that has to be implemented for plugins that want to be talkable via fcp or direct (plugin to plugin) see plugins.FCPHello for a simple sample.

Author:
saces

Method Detail

handle

void handle(PluginReplySender replysender,
            SimpleFieldSet params,
            Bucket data,
            int accesstype)
Parameters:
replysender - interface to send a reply
params - parameters passed in, can be null
data - a bucket of data passed in, can be null
access - 0: direct call (plugin to plugin), 1: FCP restricted access, 2: FCP full access
Throws:
PluginNotFoundException - If the plugin has already been removed.
